verses.text: Ach in Diosal, tzach in nib'ej wal icha junok nok' k'ultaquil chej tzek' sayoj ha' yuj taquinhtial.
Ach Dios pitzan, a wal in pensar tzach nib'anochi, ¿b'aq'uinh ol in k'och t'a ichanh junelxo?
k'ual t'ak'wal woq'ui. Axonhej wok'el tik ayoch in waeloc, yacb'an sb'uchwaj heb' anima t'ayin sk'anb'ejnhej heb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi? xchi heb'.

Ayic tzin naan juntzanh tik, ste och pitz'an t'a in k'ool. Tzin naancoti ayic ay in ek' t'a skal heb' anima, yic tzin cuchb'an heb', yic tzonh b'at t'a a templo. Manhxo jantacoc yel yav heb' yuj tzalajk'olal yet' ak'oj yuj diosal. Niwan q'uinh ton wal jun chi'.
¿Tas wal yuj schab'axk'e in k'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto wal wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Kolumal, in Diosal aji.
Ach in Diosal te cusk'olal waj ticnaik, yuj chi', manh jantacoc ach in naancot t'a yol yic ha' Jordán yet' t'a yol yic switzal Hermón yet' switzal Mizar.
Icha sk'anh yem ponholjoc ha ha' t'a niwac pajav, icha wal chi' juntzanh niwac cusk'olal tzek' t'a wib'anh uuj.
Ach Jehová, ha t'a k'ualil tza ch'oxnhej a wach'k'olal t'ayin, haxo t'ak'walil, max in och waan ach in b'itani, max in och pax waan in lesalwi t'ayach, yujto a ach tzak' in k 'inal.
Swalan icha tik t'ayach: Ach in Kolumal, ¿tas yuj tzin b'atkan satk'olal uuj? Yuj chi' cusnac in k'ool ayic tzin b'eyeq'ui, yujto tzin yixtej wal heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, xin chi.
Swab' wal syail, icha wal to smak'jipoj in b'aquil b'aj tzin yixtej heb' ajk'ool chi'. Junjun rato sb'uchwaj heb' t'ayin sk'anb'an heb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi'? xchi heb'.
¿Tas wal yuj schab'axk'e in k'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto wal wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Kolumal, in Diosal aji.
